data.eml:eml: Diphascon (Diphascon) dolomiticum, a new species of Hypsibiidae (Eutardigrada) from Italy

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pilato, Giovanni, Bertolani, Roberto (2005): Diphascon (Diphascon) dolomiticum, a new species of Hypsibiidae (Eutardigrada) from Italy. Zootaxa 914: 1-5, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171033
